attributes.action: Encourage employers to give more courtesy to job applicants
attributes.background: Now we have internet the majority of job applications are invited online Most employers do not  give applicants the courtesy of a reply if unsuccessful. It is stressful for applicants looking for work and unacceptable that today's norm is " if you don't hear back assume we're not interested"

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You could start a petition calling on Parliament to legislate to require all employers to reply to all applications regardless of whether they have been successful.
